source.9197a317:
def plot_bar(start_index, end_index, title=None, rotation=45, figsize=(10,7)):
# start_index = 221
# end_index = 230
    data_dict = dict()
    for i in range(start_index,end_index):
        desc = ((data.iloc[0][i]).split('-')[-1]).strip()
        column = columns[i]    
        data_dict[desc] = data1[column].count()

    sorted_dict=dict(sorted(data_dict.items(), key=lambda item: item[1], reverse=True))
    y=list(sorted_dict.values())
    x=list(sorted_dict.keys())
    fig = plt.figure(figsize=figsize)
    ax=sns.barplot(x=x, y=y, palette='Set1')
    #plt.xlabel('Language Used')
    plt.title(title)
    plt.xticks(rotation=rotation)

    for p in ax.patches:
       ax.annotate('{}'.format(int(p.get_height())), (p.get_x()+0.1, p.get_height()+50))
    plt.tight_layout()

source.ac09e65f: This diagram shows that the most used 'cloud computing program' is 'Amazon Web Services(AWS)'.
source.a6adf505: This diagram shows that most surveyor's use MYSql for big data solutions
source.df31a69f: Let's look at the average ages of the participants. It appears that most are between the ages of 22 to 29 years.
source.39a3ab5d: This diagram provides the user's bahaviour for cloud platform. Here, AWS has gotten the most votes.
source.53ca7921: This diagram shows the user’s opinions on which language to learn, here, once again ‘python’ was the winner.
source.62c3276f: Majority of the users do not use any sort of 'automated machine learning experiment tools', wheras, those who do use it,'Tensorboard' is the most popular.
source.08871a2d: Most of the participants hold a Master of Bachelor Degree. A significant amount of PHD are also present.
source.c132746b:
Participant distributions by country. 
From the plot , it is clear that almost 25 % of the participants are from India , followed by the USA about 10% participants. Hence , it is clear that more and more Indians are becoming data scientists.
source.c91db2e6: Most of these ambitious learners have responded with 'MYSQL'.
source.69a739ed: Most of the users do not use any 'business intelligence products', however, amongst those who do, Tableu is the most common platform.
source.b1fa8ca1: Scikit-learn is the most common automated machine learning tool within the users. ****
source.0557f305: The duagram above shows the most common learning platform amongst the user, it was'Coursera'.
source.4bf40482: Accroding to majority 'google cloud al platform' was well-known.
source.7e1b6099:
# User Trends various Features

This series of the diagrams provides the details of users preference of using different programming , language , software etc. The diagrams below show Python is the most popular programming Language among others having 15,500 users followed by SQL.
source.07a072af: In this diagram, most users do not use any sort of machine learning products, perhaps most people manually program for the machine learning solutions. However, Amazon EC2 is the most popular amongst the product users.
source.769e4400: the diagram above shows that 'Github' is the most well-renowned sharing platform within these 22k surveyor's.
